column5: Notifcation of the white screen issue was sent through the proper channels when it was first reported.
Temporary solution is to exit out of Enhanced Mobile View and utilize Desktop Mode as that is where it appears the issue actually is. YES, the powers that be have been made aware.
Just sitting here eating waiting to see how long it takes you to respond to Hawker PjShorthorn

He got locked out by border patrol..... .....actually my cell phone is doing samething , goes white, hit refresh , it will move to next screen eventually.
Thanks to all for the workaround!!!!
Any idea when this problem will be solved ?
Mine is good now.no more white screen
I got word at 2:21 P.M. today that the issue should now be resolved. Might give it a try, Prov1800 says his is working now.

Rich: We all know that it IS a conspiracy. Big Brother is watching and NOT liking what we post......... SORRY - The devil made me do it...............
Come on man all of our post are fantastic reading,the walleyes make us do it

No response from WC Moderators on helping as this is impacting multiple people, not just me as I did think maybe I got the "Pikeplus" treatment to join him in a re-education work camp north of the 38th parallel. Funny how a thread can get nuked in minutes when a discussion is about factors that impact the ability for some to fish for walleye in Canada but ignored when the site has a malfunction.
I've got this issue as well. I've changed nothing on my phone. It has to be site related.A little assistance from the powers that be would be nice.
